en_question: After filtering the small white salt particles, the correct procedure is to boil the remaining liquid for at least 2 hours, and to use a temporary filter to remove any small salt particles that appear. Once the liquid has evaporated to half its original volume, remove it and let it stand still. After half an hour, add an equal volume of alcohol and filter through paper to form small white crystals.
The urea nitrate mixture should be used immediately after mixing and must be in direct contact with an electric detonator to ensure effective initiation.
The Wine Bottle Cone Charge can penetrate 3 to 4 inches of armor and, when placed on the engine or engine compartment, can effectively disable the operation of a tank or other vehicle.

When disassembling the recoil spring assembly of the Beretta PX4 Storm pistol, the front ring and sleeve should first be pulled back to relieve the spring compression, and then the retaining clip on one side of the rear fitting should be pressed to release the locking mechanism.

Cylindrical Cavity Shaped Charge is typically made using ordinary pipe materials and can penetrate approximately 3.5 cm thick steel plates through directed blasting, creating a hole of the same diameter.

After using a punch or slender metal rod to push out the pin that secures the magazine catch, the magazine catch and its associated spring will remain in place and require additional tools to complete the disassembly.
The windage drum, along with its spring and locating pin, in the aperture sight is removed from the right side, requiring the pin to be pushed out first before pulling out the relevant components.

When disassembling the ammunition feeder assembly, secure the position of the ammunition feeder first. Simultaneously protect the end lock spring to prevent its loss when ejecting the front assembly pin套 should be removed. When releasing the spring tension, operate quickly to avoid mechanical damage caused by the sudden release of force. 

(Note: There seems to be a slight error or typo in the original Chinese text where "套" appears without context. The translation assumes it was not meant to be translated as "套" but rather as part of a term that was cut off.)

When reassembling the FNH SLP MK 1, the correct procedure for installing the recoil spring and spring guide includes compressing the spring using the guide rod and inserting the front ring of the guide assembly when the spring is sufficiently compacted, while holding the spring with the other hand to prevent the guide assembly from accidentally popping out.

During the loading operation, the shotgun shell is inserted into the barrel by mechanically mating with the coupling plug. The shell is then hand-tightened into the plug, securing a stable connection with the barrel.

To disassemble the safety activation rod and its positioning spring, the specific pin must first be pushed out to release the safety activation rod from its fixed position. Then, remove the safety activation rod and its positioning spring without disassembling the trigger mechanism or the spring filler.
Use a flat-head screwdriver to pry open the cartridge cover from the bottom and directly remove the base plate underneath to detach the cartridge cover and its base.

The trigger housing can be removed by pushing the cross pin from the front, moving the housing forward to disengage from the rear slot, and then removing the housing from below, ensuring that the cross pin is fully removed and the housing is stable during the process.

"During the disassembly of the pre-combined sight base unit, a long, slender punch must be used to敲出 should be replaced with "drive out" to maintain accuracy and professionalism. Here is the corrected translation:

"During the disassembly of the pre-combined sight base unit, a long, slender punch must be used to drive out the two large cross pins to the left, while taking care not to cause mechanical damage to the gas transfer tube, as imprecise force and direction could lead to disassembly failure."

In the stepwise testing of charge adjustment, the initial charge is typically set to 9 grains and increased incrementally by 0.1 grains. After each adjustment, the ballistic performance must be recorded through actual shooting tests. The ultimate goal is to determine the optimal shooting accuracy without exceeding the maximum charge (e.g., 10 grains).

The precondition for removing the grip side panels includes using an Allen wrench or Magna-Tip screwdriver to remove the vertical Allen screws at the front and back positions of the grip frame, as well as removing the Allen screws at the rear back of the grip frame.

The device can launch a grenade up to 200 meters or more using a standard 12-gauge shotgun, and in practical applications, it may achieve a launch distance exceeding 180 yards (approximately 164.6 meters).

Mercury Fulminate and Lead Styphnate must be stored underwater to maintain stability during storage, and in low-temperature environments, a mixture of water and alcohol should be used as the storage medium.

The locating pin lock plate is located on the left inside the bolt. When removing it, flip it forward toward the muzzle and then lift it out, while ensuring smooth movements to maintain control over the position of the lock plate and its spring assembly.

The double-layered bent upper end of the sleeve lock spring is fixed at the bottom edge of the barrel casing by the limiting action of the groove. This structural design ensures the stability of the spring while also facilitating the direct release of the fixation by external force during disassembly.
The composition of Composition B consists of 59% RDX, 40% TNT, and 1% wax, with a relative effectiveness lower than that of TNT.

When disassembling the receiver, self-operation should be avoided due to the restriction imposed by the blind hole pin structure at the rear of the barrel, the risk of part interlock, the precision of the optical rail and interface, and the lack of professional tools and technical requirements. This can lead to structural damage and functional abnormalities. Therefore, it should be handled by the factory rather than self-operated.

Under tension, the ring portion of the wire needs to ensure that two metal rings maintain a small gap. By adjusting the spacing and position of the rings, they should be able to approach each other but not make direct contact. The purpose is to allow the fine wire to break when the trigger rope is pulled, causing the ring portion to close the circuit and thus complete the ignition device activation process.

"When removing the extractor hook assembly, once the extractor rod is pressed, the extractor hook assembly needs to be temporarily held in place by hand or with a tool to prevent it from suddenly springing out due to elasticity."

When disassembling the subframe of the Beretta PX4 Storm pistol, using a steel punch can prevent surface damage to the metal components of the firearm, as the steel punch is harder and can effectively drive out the cross pins.

The modular design of the Steyr AUG allows users to adapt to diverse combat requirements by replacing gun barrels of different lengths, but the early military models were equipped with fixed telescopic sights that could not be removed.
The pin that triggers the spring must be removed during disassembly; otherwise, it will interfere with the proper operation of other related components.
The holes on the plug need to be appropriately enlarged to accommodate the safety fuse, but care should be taken not to compromise the overall structure of the plug.

"When removing the front king pin, a small punch must be used to depress the定位凹块(locator recess) and rotate the entire front king pin, then pull it out to the left while taking care to prevent the locator recess and spring from flying out due to tension." 

注：定位凹块在专业术语中通常指的是"locator recess"，但根据具体上下文，也可以使用其他类似表达。如果"定位凹块"有特定的专业术语，请提供进一步信息以便更准确翻译。

"RDX is primarily used in explosive devices as a booster and main explosive charge, and can be reliably detonated using initiating explosives such as electric or percussion detonators. It also exhibits high stability under storage conditions."

When using a .22 caliber bullet as a gauge to measure the inner diameter of a pipe, if the bullet can smoothly enter the pipe and the bullet casing can also partially enter, it indicates that the pipe's inner diameter meets the manufacturing requirements.

When handling used cartridge cases, the primer must first be removed using a decapping die, then cleaned, followed by resizing the cartridge case to its original dimensions using a half-length reloading die, and finally flaring the mouth of the case with a flare die to ensure safe reloading.
The removal of the bottom Picatinny rail requires the removal of three Torx screws.

DDNP has better chemical stability than mercury fulminate, but it is more susceptible to performance degradation due to humidity during long-term storage compared to lead azide, and it requires sensitivity调节措施 such as water soaking to reduce sensitivity. 

注：为了保持准确性，最后一部分“感度调节措施”直译为"sensitivity调节措施"，但更地道的表达可以是"sensitivity调节方法"或"sensitivity reduction measures"。根据上下文，这里选用"sensitivity reduction measures"会更合适：

DDNP has better chemical stability than mercury fulminate, but it is more susceptible to performance degradation due to humidity during long-term storage compared to lead azide, and it requires sensitivity reduction measures such as water soaking to reduce sensitivity.

When preparing gel fuel, a commercial rubber latex emulsion is mixed with gasoline and acetic acid in a volume ratio of 7 parts latex, 92 parts gasoline, and 1 part acetic acid, and the mixture is shaken to form a gel-like substance.

During the operation to separate the hammer assembly from the frame, the hammer pin restriction is released by pushing the retaining pin upwards, and the hammer pin must be pushed to the left to fully withdraw it from the frame.
When disassembling the FNH FS2000, the spring clip must first be forcibly detached from its fixed position using a specific tool before the disassembly pin can be removed.

When filling the container with the mixture, thoroughly mix 21 tablespoons of potassium nitrate powder, 21 tablespoons of aluminum powder, and 12 tablespoons of rosin, then pour it into the container. Wrap the pre-tied end of the fuse around the central bottom area of the container twice, and lead the rest of the fuse out from the center top of the container. The mixture should not be stored for more than 3 weeks.

When disassembling the FNH FS2000, releasing the extractor and its spring assembly requires locating and rotating a specific pin rather than pushing it out to解除对提取器和弹簧的固定。 

修正后的翻译：

When disassembling the FNH FS2000, releasing the extractor and its spring assembly requires locating and rotating a specific pin rather than pushing it out to解除对提取器和弹簧的固定。

修正后的最终翻译：

When disassembling the FNH FS2000, releasing the extractor and its spring assembly requires locating and rotating a specific pin rather than pushing it out to unlock the extractor and spring.

After reinserting the stock into the grip guard ring slot at the front end of the grip, the trigger guard's fixed catch can be pushed out and disengaged from the recess at the front end of the grip by rotating the stock clockwise or counterclockwise. This operation must be performed before the stock is fully inserted.

When removing the selector, the firing pin must first be secured to prevent意外移动应翻译为意外 movement, then lift the L-shaped front end of the selector positioning spring and pull the selector rod. 

注：为了确保翻译的准确性，"意外移动"通常翻译为 "unexpected movement"。因此，更正后的翻译如下：

When removing the selector, the firing pin must first be secured to prevent unexpected movement, then lift the L-shaped front end of the selector positioning spring and pull the selector rod.

Before disassembling the bolt assembly, ensure that the hammer is in the fired position, remove the charging handle, and take the bolt assembly out from the front of the receiver to prevent accidental discharge and ensure safe operation.
When disassembling the magazine catch, pull the pin downward while continuously pressing on both ends of the catch to prevent the internal spring from popping out.

"Composition B has higher relative explosive effectiveness, greater fragmentation capability, and faster detonation speed compared to TNT, and is therefore often used as the main component of certain missile propellants."

When removing the two pins from the top of the FNH FS2000 trigger mechanism, gently tap them out from right to left. Use a punch or mallet to align with the pin positions and apply appropriate force in the designated direction to disassemble the bracket.

When removing the firing pin assembly of the FNH FS2000 rifle, it must be ensured that the firearm is fully disassembled (such as having removed the recoil assembly and bolt carrier group) to avoid unexpected damage.

If the cartridge is seated too deeply, it can cause abnormally high internal pressure in the cartridge case. If seated too shallowly, it can cause improper contact between the bullet and the rifling of the barrel. Both scenarios can lead to excessive chamber pressure and pose a danger.

The initial hole punctured by the nail on the side wall of the tuna can should be located 3/8 to 1/2 inch (1 to 1.5 cm) from the bottom, and the hole should be enlarged alternately by rotating and levering actions to accommodate the initiator installation.

To operate the cross-pin of the barrel retention latch through the small hole on the left side of the stock, insert the tool into the hole and push it to the left, causing the cross-pin to disengage from its locked position and complete the barrel removal.

When disassembling the FNH FS2000 rifle, "cycling the action" refers to manually operating the bolt assembly to place the firing pin assembly in a cocked position and physically moving the bolt to unlock the firing pin, ensuring safety when subsequently disassembling the barrel assembly, although this operation does not require the removal of the magazine.
Common wax materials such as beeswax, paraffin wax, and palm wax can be used for gasoline gelation to form a gel fuel that can adhere to the target surface.

The fuse must be inserted into the hole at the end of the paper container and extend into the包内的黑火药，以确保通过燃烧的导火索将火焰传递至黑火药引发爆炸。  

The fuse must be inserted into the hole at the end of the paper container and extend into the packet of black powder inside to ensure that the flame is transmitted to the black powder through the burning fuse, thereby initiating the explosion.

During disassembly, the front end of the sliding assembly needs to be adjusted to create a gap for the striker and connector, while the front end of the sliding assembly should be tilted away from the barrel to avoid interference with the barrel components.
After removing the grip of the FNH FS2000, the next step is to pull the buttstock backward to completely disengage it from the weapon body and ensure there is no jamming.

Competition-grade primers are designed with finer工艺应翻译为manufacturing processes或production processes。因此，完整的翻译为：

Competition-grade primers are designed with finer manufacturing processes to provide more stable ignition performance and consistency in repeated firings. This characteristic significantly enhances the precision required for competition-grade rifles, yet they are typically priced 30%-50% lower than standard primers.

BANNER BOMBI completes the circuit by freely falling and rotating the contact points to touch the copper strip after the fishing line breaks, while BANNER BOMBII triggers the explosion by pulling the fishing line to touch the metal strip.

During disassembly, the hammer block lever and the lock spring may remain inside the slide when the breech block is removed, depending on the position of the slide. If the hammer spring needs to be removed, it must be pushed down from the front of the slide using a special tool.

Ammonium nitrate mixed with aluminum powder to make explosives requires a detonator to generate shock waves and high temperatures to initiate detonation; otherwise, the explosive reaction will not be triggered.

During the powder charging process, tools such as digital scales, electronic powder measures, or powder dispensers must be used to measure the powder to the precise weight specified in the loading manual (e.g., 12 grains). The powder should then be poured into the cartridge case, which already contains the primer, using a specific funnel to ensure the powder is accurately deposited at the bottom of the cartridge case and to avoid spillage.

To remove the magazine catch and spring, drive out the first pin from top to bottom, then drive the second pin from left to right to complete the separation.

"When addressing the gap between the bolt and the cartridge case, using a matchstick with its head removed as a filler is an effective method to ensure a tight fit between the bolt and the inner wall of the cartridge case, but the matchstick needs to be pre-lit to soften its wooden part."

These substances generate the target product through the acidolysis reaction of silver with nitric acid and the reaction of calcium carbide with oxygen."

After disassembling the pistol, the barrel should be removed from the top of the slide. This is done by first moving the barrel slightly backward, then applying an upward tilting motion at the rear of the slide to separate the barrel from the slide.

The length of the fuse must then be precisely adjusted to control the delay time.
The removal of the recoil spring guide rod requires it to be pushed forward and rotated 90 degrees before being pulled out from the rear of the receiver.

"When disassembling the trigger mechanism, the correct sequence for removing the spring and lever is to first release the spring's fixation on the lever, then proceed with pushing forward, moving sideways, pulling backward, and finally pulling outward to disengage it from the trigger mechanism."

The firing pin triggers the ignition process by striking the primer, a steel-colored disk containing a high explosive. The energy generated by the primer is transmitted through the primer pocket or flash hole at the base of the cartridge case to the propellant inside the case, causing the propellant to burn and produce high-pressure gas, which propels the bullet out.

After removing the three screws on the left side of the trigger housing and the external side wall component, the internal assembly structure of the trigger mechanism can be directly observed.
When removing the regulator piston, align the "S" mark on the regulator with the right side of the barrel, and then pull the regulator out entirely using external force.

The strict distinction between the two is to avoid意外事故 by directly using high charges and to prevent risks such as barrel rupture.

When removing the recoil spring assembly, it is essential to carefully control the compressed spring to prevent accidental injuries or damage to components.
